physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a tower with a dome at the dome-shaped top and a clock just below it. To the right of the tower, there is a double storey roofed building with numerous windows. This building and the tower are separated by a road. A couple of people can be seen walking on the pavements.
title_text: Malacca Municipal Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
